title: Rhode Island Singer Records Album After Her Husband, Bandmate Dies
teaser: MorganEve Swain of the band Brown Bird completed the album "Axis Mundi" after her musical partner Dave Lamb died from cancer.
contentencoded:
MorganEve Swain, a Rhode Island singer and half of the band Brown Bird, recorded and finished an album, titled “Axis Mundi,” after her husband – and musical partner – Dave Lamb was diagnosed with leukemia and died last year.

Swain and Lamb were fixtures in the New England folk music scene. Swain spoke with Here & Now’s Meghna Chakrabarti about the album, beginning with the song she says she’s most proud of, “Bannerman.”

  • Read more on this story via Radio Boston

Guest

  • MorganEve Swain,Â half of the band Brown Bird. She tweets @brownbirdmusic.
